subject: Off topic but LOL
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Someone came into work today and gave me 8 free passes for something called a slingshot ride here in central fl so when I got home I thought I would look it up to see what I will NOT be doing. I ran across this one and its funny and terrifying!!! So of course I had to share it with you guys LOL I dont think they use that kind of harness here its more like roller coaster ride style lockdown.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V5NdZRb9rqI&feature=related

Gonna pass that one off to some friends they will enjoy it more than me LOL

Misty
